actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain mineral rights in and under certain lands near Palo Verde, Arizona.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the owners of specified lands near Palo Verde, Arizona, all mineral rights of the United States therein.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain mineral rights in and under certain lands near Palo Verde, Arizona.
